SELECT c.cover as cover, ct.uid as uid, c.total_price as praise_number, c.pkg_name as pkg_name, ct.course_pkg_id as pkg_id, SUM(p.praise_number) praise_number, AVG(p.comments_star) comments_star, c.apply_number as apply_number, c.play_type_id as play_type_id FROM collect ct LEFT JOIN period_evaluation p ON ct.course_pkg_id=p.course_id LEFT JOIN course_pkg c on ct.course_pkg_id=c.uid where ct.student_id =#{uid} AND ct.tenant_id = #{tid} and c.status="1"
GROUP BY ct.uid
